DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor/lesion identification domain.:A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._Satisfy the requirements or expectations of._Bulk at a site (other than the mediastinum) where any mass measures 10 cm or more by an imaging study._That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.
